TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FontDialog extends System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog

summary.span: Prompts the user to choose a font from among those installed on the local computer.

span.span: Prompts the user to choose a font from among those installed on the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繼承的成員必須叫用它來建立這個特定的通用對話方塊。The inherited member must be invoked to create this specific common dialog box. 您可以覆寫實作特定的對話方塊攔截程序功能。 can be overridden to implement specific dialog box hook functionality. 當您建立的執行個體，部分讀取/寫入屬性會設為初始的值。When you create an instance of , some of the read/write properties are set to initial values. 如需這些值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of these values, see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用顯示。The following code example uses to display a . 此程式碼需要已建立具有並放置在其上的按鈕。This code requires that a has already been created with a and button placed on it. 它也需要`fontDialog1`已建立。It also requires that the `fontDialog1` has been created. 包含大小資訊，但不是色彩資訊。The contains the size information but not the color information. [!code-cpp[Classic FontDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic FontDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FontDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic FontDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FontDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic FontDialog Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立的執行個體，下列的讀取/寫入屬性會初始化。When you create an instance of , the following read/write properties are initialized. |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`true`| ||`true`| ||`true`| ||`true`| ||`Color.Black`| ||`false`| ||00| ||00| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`true`| ||`false`| 您可以變更其中任何一個屬性，透過單獨呼叫屬性的值。You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property.

summary.span: Occurs when the user clicks the **Apply** button in the font dialog box.

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks the **Apply** button in the font dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次**套用**按一下按鈕時，另一個就會引發事件。Every time the **Apply** button is clicked, another event is raised. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用， ，並成員和處理事件。The following code example demonstrates using the , , and members and handling the event. 若要在表單，其中包含執行此範例中貼上下列程式碼名為`FontDialog1`並名為`Button1`。To run this example paste the following code in a form containing a named `FontDialog1` and a named `Button1`. MemberSignature.Value: protected override IntPtr HookProc (IntPtr hWnd, int msg, IntPtr wparam, IntPtr lparam);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance native int HookProc(native int hWnd, int32 msg, native int wparam, native int lparam) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function HookProc (hWnd As IntPtr, msg As Integer, wparam As IntPtr, lparam As IntPtr) As IntPtr
protected: override IntPtr HookProc(IntPtr hWnd, int msg, IntPtr wparam, IntPtr lparam);
override this.HookProc : nativeint * int * nativeint * nativeint -> nativeint

param.name: hWnd
param.span: The handle to the dialog box window.

span.span: The handle to the dialog box window.
The message being received.
Additional information about the message.
Additional information about the message.

summary.span: Specifies the common dialog box hook procedure that is overridden to add specific functionality to a common dialog box.

span.span: Specifies the common dialog box hook procedure that is overridden to add specific functionality to a common dialog box.

returns.span: A zero value if the default dialog box procedure processes the message; a nonzero value if the default dialog box procedure ignores the message.

span.span: A zero value if the default dialog box procedure processes the message; a nonzero value if the default dialog box procedure ignores the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 攔截程序是由此函式可以攔截事件之前到達應用程式的機制。A hook procedure is a mechanism by which a function can intercept events before they reach an application. 當您覆寫方法類別，作業系統會叫用您要將作業系統的訊息張貼到視窗的函式的覆寫。When you override the method for a class, the operating system invokes your override of the function to post operating system messages to the window. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method. 此範例包含的類別，繼承類別。The example consists of a class that inherits the class. 在類別中覆寫時，此範例評估結果的方法`msg`參數與特定 Windows 訊息的常數值。In the class's override, the example evaluates the method's `msg` parameter against constant values for particular Windows messages. 如果`msg`參數等於指定的常數，該範例會寫入追蹤輸出，找出 Windows 訊息傳遞給方法。If the `msg` parameter equals the specified constant, the example writes trace output identifying the Windows message that was passed to the method. 這個範例需要在其中類別方法會宣告繼承類別。This example requires that the class in which the method is declared inherits the class. [!code-cpp[HookProc Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/HookProc Example/CPP/fontdialogoverride.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[HookProc Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/HookProc Example/CS/fontdialogoverride.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HookProc Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/HookProc Example/VB/fontdialogoverride.vb#1)]

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxSize : int with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the maximum point size a user can select.

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum point size a user can select.

value.span: 使用者可以選取的最大點數。

span.span: The maximum point size a user can select.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了讓的最大和最小大小設定才會生效必須是大於，而且兩者都必須是大於 0。In order for the maximum and minimum size settings to take effect, must be greater than , and both must be greater than 0. 嘗試將此屬性設定為小於 0 值會導致正在使用的 0 的值。Attempts to set this property to values less than 0 will result in a value of 0 being used. 如果您設定的值小於，設定為。If you set to a value less than , is set to . 設定的作用和相同的值是限制為單一的字型大小的 選取的大小。The effect of setting and to the same values is to limit the size selection to a single font size. 點大小為 0 時，沒有字型的大小限制。When the point size is 0, there are no font size limits. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用， ，並成員和處理事件。The following code example demonstrates using the , , and members and handling the event. 若要在表單，其中包含執行此範例中貼上下列程式碼名為`FontDialog1`並名為`Button1`。To run this example paste the following code in a form containing a named `FontDialog1` and a named `Button1`. summary.span: Resets all dialog box options to their default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當選項會重設、 刪除線、 底線和色彩效果會啟用。When the options are reset, the strikethrough, underline, and color effects are enabled. 所列的字型包含只系統所支援的螢幕字型。The fonts listed include only the screen fonts supported by the system.
